name: Cooleaf, Inc.
description: Provider of an online marketplace for local fitness classes. The company provides local fitness businesses with an online marketing tool and audience, and provides fitness consumers with portal for fitness programs near them, and operating within their scheduling needs.
one_liner: Provider of an online marketplace for local fitness classes. The company provides local fitness businesses with an online marketing tool and audience, and provides fitness consumers with portal for fitness programs near them, and operating within their scheduling needs.
